docs.lead_paragraph: After Mariano Rivera stifled the Red Sox from the mound, Brett Gardner, replacing an injured Johnny Damon, fouled off three pitches before he singled to send home the winning run.

headline.main: After a Game to Forget, a Home Run to Remember
headline.print_headline: After a Game to Forget, a Home Run to Remember

docs.lead_paragraph: As the Yankees celebrated their East championship with champagne, cigars and bottles of beer, Boston Red Sox fans yesterday were left to deal with a September swoon. On Sept. 3, the team had a nine-game lead over Toronto in the wild-card race. But after Wednesday night's 7-5 defeat to the Yankees, Boston has lost six of its last seven games. Texas is within 4 games; Toronto, which lost by 8-5 to the Yankees last night, is 5 games back.
docs.abstract: Problems besetting Boston Red Sox discussed (M)
docs.snippet: As the Yankees celebrated their East championship with champagne, cigars and bottles of beer, Boston Red Sox fans yesterday were left to deal with a September swoon.     On Sept. 3, the team had a nine-game lead over Toronto in the wild-card race....

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Series will be played by two clubs with great offensive power, but the Mets have better balance than the Boston Red Sox and better pitching. And not even Fenway Park and the use of the designated hitter in the American League ball park should change that fundamental and decisive fact. Pitching wins. Look what happened in the playoff: The Houston Astros held the Mets to a combined batting average of .189, that's how good their pitching was. But the Mets still won the pennant - that's how good their pitching was. The Red Sox and the Mets are two clubs with somewhat similar managers, men who like to sit back and wait for the big inning. They like to force things. They're both somewhat low-key in nature, at least, more low-key than Billy Martin. I know them both: I played against Davey Johnson, and I worked for John McNamara when he was managing the San Diego Padres. They are both outstanding, they are both men who like to turn the power loose.
